title: Security Boundaries of Quantum Key Reuse: A Quantitative Evaluation Method for QKD Key Rotation Interval and Security Benefits Combined with Block Ciphers
summary: With the rapid development of quantum computing, classical cryptography systems are facing increasing security threats, making it urgent to build architectures resilient to quantum attacks.
